Title: Inception
Description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform inception.

Genre.Name: Sci-Fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction film, a genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Edward Nolan is an English film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Genre.Name: Sci-Fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction film, a genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

Director.Name: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
Director.Bio: Lana Wachowski and Lilly Wachowski, also known as the Wachowskis, are American film and TV directors, writers, and producers.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action film, a genre where the protagonist is thrust into a series of events that typically involve violence, extended fighting, physical feats, and frantic chases.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Edward Nolan is an English film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Genre.Name: Sci-Fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction film, a genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

Director.Name: Christopher Nolan
Director.Bio: Christopher Edward Nolan is an English film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film, a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Director.Name: David Fincher
Director.Bio: David Andrew Leo Fincher is an American film director.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: Crime film, a genre that revolves around the actions of criminals and the detectives or law enforcement agents who seek to bring them to justice.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: Quentin Jerome Tarantino is an American film director, screenwriter, producer, author, and actor.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film, a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Director.Name: Robert Zemeckis
Director.Bio: Robert Lee Zemeckis is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama film, a genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

Director.Name: Frank Darabont
Director.Bio: Frank Árpád Darabont is an American film director, screenwriter, and producer.

Title: The Godfather
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: Crime film, a genre that revolves around the actions of criminals and the detectives or law enforcement agents who seek to bring them to justice.

Director.Name: Francis Ford Coppola
Director.Bio: Francis Ford Coppola is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy film, a genre that uses magic and other supernatural forms as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting.

Director.Name: Peter Jackson
Director.Bio: Sir Peter Robert Jackson is a New Zealand film director, screenwriter, and film producer.

Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

Genre.Name: Sci-Fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction film, a genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena that are not fully accepted by mainstream science.

Director.Name: George Lucas
Director.Bio: George Walton Lucas Jr. is an American film director, producer, screenwriter, and entrepreneur.

Title: Jurassic Park
Description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

Genre.Name: Adventure
Genre.Description: Adventure film, a genre where the protagonist goes on an exciting, unusual journey or quest.

Director.Name: Steven Spielberg
Director.Bio: Steven Allan Spielberg is an American film director, producer, and screenwriter.
